00019 #include <ProtLigScore.H>
00020 #include <ProtLigScoreParameters.H>
00021 
00022 namespace SimSite3D{
00023 
00024 class ProtLigActTable{
00025 
00026 public:
00027   typedef struct{
00028     std::string lig_id;
00029     my_float_t affi;
00030     my_float_t efficiency;
00031     my_float_t orient;
00032     std::vector<int> atom_idz;
00033   }score_t;
00034 
00035   // -- NOTE::::::::
00036   // the ligand iterators will be invalidated anyhow -- we should only keep
00037   // protein atom info -- is protein atom indexes faster than protein atom
00038   // iterators?
00039   
00040   ProtLigActTable(PDBStructure &prot)
00041   {
00042     A_prot = &prot;
00043     build_hphob_SC_to_atom_map(prot);
00044     A_col_sums.resize(prot.atoms_end() - prot.atoms_begin());
00045     std::fill(A_col_sums.begin(), A_col_sums.end(), 0);
00046   }   
00047 
00048   ~ProtLigActTable() { ; }
00049 
00050   void
00051   add_row(ProtLigScore &s_info)
00052   {
00053     // Assume we only have prot-lig salt bridges and hbonds and atom A is 
00054     // always from the protein and atom B is always a ligand atom
00055      
00056     std::string tmp_lig_name = s_info.lig_name();
00057     size_t slash_pos = tmp_lig_name.rfind("/");
00058     if(slash_pos != std::string::npos) 
00059       tmp_lig_name = tmp_lig_name.substr(slash_pos + 1);
00060     size_t dot_pos = tmp_lig_name.rfind(".");
00061     if(dot_pos != std::string::npos)
00062       tmp_lig_name = tmp_lig_name.substr(0, dot_pos);
00063      
00064     score_t tmp;
00065     tmp.lig_id = tmp_lig_name;
00066     tmp.affi = s_info.affiscore();
00067     tmp.efficiency = s_info.ligand_efficiency();
00068     tmp.orient = s_info.orientscore();
00069 
00070     // Salt bridges
00071     std::vector<ProtLigScore::salt_bridge_t>::const_iterator sb_i;
00072     sb_i = s_info.salt_bridges_begin();
00073     for( ; sb_i < s_info.salt_bridges_end(); ++sb_i){
00074       size_t idx = sb_i->A - A_prot->atoms_begin();
00075       ++(*(A_col_sums.begin() + idx));
00076       tmp.atom_idz.push_back(idx); 
00077     }
00078 
00079     // Hbonds
00080     std::vector<ProtLigScore::hbond_t>::const_iterator hb_i;
00081     hb_i = s_info.hbonds_begin();
00082     for( ; hb_i < s_info.hbonds_end(); ++hb_i){
00083       size_t idx = hb_i->A - A_prot->atoms_begin();
00084       ++(*(A_col_sums.begin() + idx));
00085       tmp.atom_idz.push_back(idx); 
00086     }
00087 
00088     // Hphob interactions
00089     std::map<residue_vci, bool>::const_iterator map_i;
00090     map_i = s_info.hphob_SC_begin();
00091     for( ; map_i != s_info.hphob_SC_end(); ++map_i){
00092       atom_vci SC_CB = hphob_SC_to_atom(map_i->first);
00093       if(SC_CB == atom_t::NULL_ATOM_VCI) continue;
00094 
00095       size_t idx = SC_CB - A_prot->atoms_begin();
00096       ++(*(A_col_sums.begin() + idx));
00097       tmp.atom_idz.push_back(idx); 
00098     }
00099     A_scores.push_back(tmp);
00100   }
00101 
00102   void
00103   print_table(std::ostream &out, char delim = '|')
00104   {
00105     // Print table headings
00106     out << "ligand ID" << delim << "AffiScore" << delim << "ligand efficiency"
00107         << delim << "OrientScore" << delim;
00108 
00109     std::vector<int> column_atom_idz;
00110     std::vector<int>::const_iterator col_sum;
00111     for(col_sum = A_col_sums.begin(); col_sum < A_col_sums.end(); ++col_sum){
00112       if(*col_sum == 0) continue;
00113 
00114       int idx = col_sum - A_col_sums.begin();
00115       column_atom_idz.push_back(idx);
00116       atom_vci atom = A_prot->atoms_begin() + idx;
00117       
00118       if(atom->chainID != ' ') out << "(" << atom->chainID << ")";
00119       out << PDB_residues::residue_to_string(atom->res) << atom->res_num;
00120       if(atom->iCode != ' ') out << atom->iCode;
00121 
00122       // CB is placeholder atom for hydrophobic sidechain
00123       if(atom->name == CB) out << " SC" << delim;
00124       // Polar interaction
00125       else out << " " << PDB_residues::atom_to_string(atom->name) << delim;
00126     }
00127     out << "\n";
00128 
00129     // Print out the rows
00130     out.precision(3);  // 3 significant digits seems reasonable
00131     std::vector<score_t>::iterator score_iter = A_scores.begin();
00132     for( ; score_iter < A_scores.end(); ++score_iter){
00133       out << score_iter->lig_id << delim << score_iter->affi << delim
00134           << score_iter->efficiency << delim << score_iter->orient << delim;
00135 
00136       // Sort the hit atoms & side chains CBs and get a unique set of the
00137       // sorted indices
00138       std::sort(score_iter->atom_idz.begin(), score_iter->atom_idz.end());
00139       std::vector<int>::const_iterator hit_atom_idx, hit_atoms_end;
00140       hit_atom_idx = score_iter->atom_idz.begin();
00141       hit_atoms_end = 
00142         std::unique(score_iter->atom_idz.begin(), score_iter->atom_idz.end());
00143 
00144       std::vector<int>::const_iterator col_idx = column_atom_idz.begin();
00145       for( ; col_idx < column_atom_idz.end(); ++col_idx){
00146         if(*col_idx == *hit_atom_idx){
00147           if(hit_atom_idx >= score_iter->atom_idz.end()){
00148             std::cerr << "Too many hit atom indices \n";
00149             return;
00150           }
00151           out << "1" << delim;
00152           ++hit_atom_idx; 
00153         }else if(*col_idx > *hit_atom_idx && 
00154                  hit_atom_idx < hit_atoms_end){
00155           std::cerr << "Column indices do not match hit atom indices\n";
00156           return;
00157         }else out << "0" << delim;
00158       }
00159       out << "\n";
00160     }
00161   }
00162 
00163   atom_vci
00164   hphob_SC_to_atom(const residue_vci res)
00165   {
00166     std::map<residue_vci, atom_vci>::const_iterator my_iter;
00167     my_iter = A_hphob_SC_to_atom.find(res);
00168     if(my_iter == A_hphob_SC_to_atom.end()){
00169       if(res->name != GLY && res->name != SER)
00170         std::cerr << "Unknown residue in hphob_SC_to_atom\n";
00171       return atom_t::NULL_ATOM_VCI;
00172     }
00173     return my_iter->second;
00174   }
00175 private:
00176   void
00177   build_hphob_SC_to_atom_map(PDBStructure &prot);
00178 
00179   const PDBStructure *A_prot;
00180   std::vector<int> A_col_sums;
00181   std::map<residue_vci, atom_vci> A_hphob_SC_to_atom;
00182   std::vector<score_t> A_scores;
00183 };
00184 #if 0
00185 int main(const int argc, const char **argv)
00186 {
00187   std::cout << "\n" << argv[0] << " (" << PACKAGE_NAME << ") " 
00188             << PACKAGE_VERSION << "\n\n";
00189 
00190   // Do not return -1 here since system, fork, etc return -1 on failure, and we
00191   // wish to distinguish between system and program failure
00192   ProtLigScoreParameters my_params(argc, argv);
00193   BaseParameters::status_t status = my_params.status();
00194   if(status == BaseParameters::DISPLAY_HELP_ONLY) return 0;
00195   else if(status != BaseParameters::READY){
00196     std::cerr << "\n" << argv[0]
00197               << " *FAILED* \n\tCould not initialize parameters\n";
00198     return 1;
00199   }
00200   
00201   PDBStructure prot(my_params.prot_fname);
00202   if(my_params.lig_fname.length()){
00203     mol2File lig(my_params.lig_fname);
00204     lig.calc_charge_sums();
00205     ProtLigScore my_score(prot, lig);
00206     my_score.report_scores(std::cout);
00207   }else{
00208     std::ifstream lig_list_file;
00209     open_ifstream(lig_list_file, my_params.lig_list_fname);
00210     if(lig_list_file.fail()) return 1;
00211 
00212     std::vector<score_t> scores;
00213     typedef std::map<residue_vci, std::vector<bool> > hphob_map_t;
00214     typedef std::map<atom_vci, std::vector<bool> > hbond_map_t;
00215     std::map<residue_vci, std::vector<bool> > prot_hphob_SCs;
00216     std::map<atom_vci, std::vector<bool> > prot_hbond_atoms;
00217     for(std::string line; std::getline(lig_list_file, line); ){
00218       mol2File lig(line);
00219       lig.calc_charge_sums();
00220       ProtLigScore my_score(prot, lig);
00221       my_score.report_scores(std::cout);
00222       if(my_params.build_interact_tbl){
00223         score_t s;
00224         s.lig_id = line;
00225         s.affi = my_score.affiscore();
00226         s.affieff = my_score.affiefficientscore();
00227         s.orient = my_score.orientscore(); 
00228         scores.push_back(s);
00229         // Assumption -- atom A in hbonds and salt bridges are always from the
00230         // protein and atom B is always from the ligand
00231         std::vector<ProtLigScore::salt_bridge_t>::const_iterator sb_iter;
00232         sb_iter = my_score.salt_bridges_begin();
00233         for( ; sb_iter < my_score.salt_bridges_end(); ++sb_iter){
00234           hbond_map_t::iterator hb = prot_hbond_atoms.lower_bound(sb_iter->A);
00235         }
00236        
00237       }
00238     }
00239     if(my_params.build_interact_tbl){
00240     
00241     }
00242   }
00243   return 0; 
00244 }
